codex: Codex: Space Marines (with Space Wolves Index)

rule.name: Lightning Assault
rule.effect: All ADEPTUS ASTARTES units can charge after Advancing or Falling Back

stratagems.name: Armour of Contempt
stratagems.effect: Worsen AP of attacks vs ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit by 1

stratagems.name: Blitzing Fusillade
stratagems.effect: Unit that Advanced: ranged attacks get [ASSAULT] & +1 to Hit

stratagems.name: Lightning Assault
stratagems.effect: Unit that Fell Back: +2 to Charge roll this phase

stratagems.name: Storm of Violence
stratagems.effect: Unit that charged: melee Crit Hits cause 1 extra hit

stratagems.name: Ride Hard, Ride Fast
stratagems.effect: MOUNTED/VEHICLE unit: +2" Move and Advance rolls

stratagems.name: Pack Hunters
stratagems.effect: SW unit: +1 to Wound in melee vs enemy engaged by another SW unit

rule.name: Deeds Worthy of Saga
rule.effect: Each time a SPACE WOLVES unit destroys an enemy unit, it gains a Saga point. Units with Saga points get +1 to Hit rolls (melee). Units with 2+ Saga points also get +1 to Wound rolls (melee).

stratagems.name: Armour of Contempt
stratagems.effect: Worsen AP of attacks vs ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit by 1

stratagems.name: Warrior Pride
stratagems.effect: SW unit: melee attacks get [SUSTAINED HITS 1]

stratagems.name: Bestial Nature
stratagems.effect: SW unit: melee attacks get [LANCE]. If unit has Saga point, also +1 Strength

stratagems.name: Cunning of the Wolf
stratagems.effect: SW INFANTRY: can move through enemy models (not end on them)

stratagems.name: Go for the Throat
stratagems.effect: SW unit: RR Charge roll; if charging MONSTER/VEHICLE, can RR Wound too

stratagems.name: Seeking a Saga
stratagems.effect: SW CHAR: gains 1 Saga point

rule.name: Combat Doctrines
rule.effect: Start in Devastator Doctrine (RR Wound 1s, ranged, vs nearest enemy). Turn 3+: Assault Doctrine (RR Wound 1s, melee, vs nearest enemy). Can spend 1CP once per battle at start of Fight phase to switch early.

stratagems.name: Armour of Contempt
stratagems.effect: Worsen AP of attacks vs ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit by 1

stratagems.name: Only in Death Does Duty End
stratagems.effect: ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHAR destroyed: fight on death before removal

stratagems.name: Honour the Chapter
stratagems.effect: ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit: fight again at end of phase (if still in Engagement Range)

stratagems.name: Adaptive Strategy
stratagems.effect: Switch to Assault Doctrine early (once per battle)

stratagems.name: Storm of Fire
stratagems.effect: ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit: Improve AP of ranged attacks by 1

stratagems.name: Squad Tactics
stratagems.effect: ADEPTUS ASTARTES BATTLELINE: Fall Back after being targeted (before attacks resolved)

rule.name: Close-Range Eradication
rule.effect: ADEPTUS ASTARTES units get +1 Strength on ranged attacks at half range or less

stratagems.name: Armour of Contempt
stratagems.effect: Worsen AP of attacks vs ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit by 1

stratagems.name: Aggressor Doctrine
stratagems.effect: Unit within 12" of enemy: ranged attacks get [LETHAL HITS]

stratagems.name: Breaching Fire
stratagems.effect: Unit: ranged attacks get [IGNORES COVER]

stratagems.name: Immolation Protocols
stratagems.effect: Unit with TORRENT weapon: +1 to Wound for TORRENT attacks

stratagems.name: Rapid Embarkation
stratagems.effect: INFANTRY: embark after shooting (TRANSPORT must have moved)

stratagems.name: Point-Blank Overwatch
stratagems.effect: Unit: Fire Overwatch hits on 5+ instead of 6

rule.name: Armoured Wrath
rule.effect: ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE units: ranged attacks get [LETHAL HITS] vs targets on/within objectives

stratagems.name: Armour of Contempt
stratagems.effect: Worsen AP of attacks vs ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit by 1

stratagems.name: Power of the Machine Spirit
stratagems.effect: VEHICLE: ignore all modifiers to Hit rolls

stratagems.name: Armoured Fury
stratagems.effect: VEHICLE that Advanced: can still charge; +1 to Charge roll

stratagems.name: Mercy is Weakness
stratagems.effect: VEHICLE: ranged attacks get [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] vs INFANTRY

stratagems.name: Repair Crew
stratagems.effect: VEHICLE: regain D3 lost wounds

stratagems.name: Rolling Fortress
stratagems.effect: VEHICLE: friendly units within 3" get Benefit of Cover vs ranged attacks

rule.name: Shadow Masters
rule.effect: ADEPTUS ASTARTES units: enemies get -1 to Hit when targeting this unit from 12"+ away

stratagems.name: Armour of Contempt
stratagems.effect: Worsen AP of attacks vs ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit by 1

stratagems.name: Guerrilla Tactics
stratagems.effect: INFANTRY: if not in Engagement Range, remove from battlefield; set up in Reserves

stratagems.name: A Deadly Prize
stratagems.effect: Remove unit from objective: enemy unit on that objective takes D3 mortal wounds

stratagems.name: Surgical Strikes
stratagems.effect: Unit: melee attacks get [PRECISION]

stratagems.name: The Trap is Sprung
stratagems.effect: Unit that charged from Reserves: RR Wound rolls in melee this phase

stratagems.name: Decapitating Blow
stratagems.effect: If enemy CHARACTER destroyed this turn: gain 1CP

rule.name: Shield of the Imperium
rule.effect: ADEPTUS ASTARTES units: add 1 to OC characteristic while within your deployment zone or on an objective in No Man's Land

stratagems.name: Armour of Contempt
stratagems.effect: Worsen AP of attacks vs ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit by 1

stratagems.name: Unyielding Resistance
stratagems.effect: Unit on objective: -1 Damage (min 1) for attacks against it

stratagems.name: Unassailable Fortress
stratagems.effect: INFANTRY: enemy charge rolls of 1-2 always fail

stratagems.name: No Step Backwards
stratagems.effect: INFANTRY that Remained Stationary: cannot be moved by enemy abilities

stratagems.name: Stand Your Ground
stratagems.effect: INFANTRY that Remained Stationary: ranged attacks get [HEAVY]

stratagems.name: Reinforced Position
stratagems.effect: INFANTRY on objective in your deployment: improve Save by 1 (to max 2+)
